english.segment1: [Verse 1:]. Let all the earth declare Your Name. Voices resounding heaven's fame. Our God be praised forever
english.segment2: [Verse 2:]. Flood all the earth with endless light. Raise up the streets from death to life. Our God be praised forever. Oh God be praised
english.segment3: [Chorus:]. Come let Your glory arise. And shine as the nations collide with Your story. Love overtaking our lives. Arise as our hearts come alight with Your glory
english.segment4: [Verse 3:]. Let all injustice shut it's mouth. As we join our hearts and start to shout. Our God be praised forever. Oh God be praised
english.segment5: [Bridge:]. Be unto Your Name. All glory and honour. Singing holy is our God. Holy is our God
english.segment6: Your life on display. Your strength in our weakness. Singing holy is our God. Holy is our God
english.segment7: How great is Your love. How great are Your ways. There's nothing we want more. But to live for You God
english.segment8: There's no other Name. More worthy of praise. Jesus let Your love be known
english.segment9: [Tags:]. We'll shine with Your glory. We'll shine with Your glory. We'll shine with Your glory. It's all for Your glory.
